creator: cam@apache.org
text:
"The transcoder will have the same behavior if you specify the KEY_HEIGHT without initializing the KEY_WIDTH. In all cases (even if both keys are provided), the transcoder will preserve the apsect ratio of the SVG document."

This is misleading.  The output image size will be exactly specified by the KEY_{HEIGHT,WIDTH} hints, and preserveAspectRatio="" in the document will determine if the aspect ratio is preserved within that space.
